text: Several Canadian naval units have been named HMCS Huron. * was a Second World War destroyer. * was an active from 1972 to 2005. Battle Honours * Atlantic, 1943 * Arctic, 1943–1945 * Biscay, 1943–1944 * Norway, 1945 * Korea, 1952–1953 ==References== :* Directorate of History and Heritage - HMCS Huron Category:Royal Canadian Navy ship names
title: HMCS Huron
